question: India signed a MoU with which country on technology cooperation in Road Infrastructure Sector?
explanation:
The Ministry of Road Transport and Highways signed a Memorandum of Understanding (MoU) with their counterpart in Austria on technology cooperation in the Road Infrastructure Sector.
This Indo-Austria bilateral cooperation in the sector would focus on enhanced road safety and exploring financing possibilities in the sector. It will also strengthen ties, enhance trade and regional integration between the two countries.
